title: How to Draw Pokemon
author: Tracey West
description: Grab your pencil, pick up some paper, and get ready to to create some amazing, action-packed Pok mon pictures Catch step-by-step tips on drawing your favorite Pok mon, including Chikorita, Cyndaquil, Totodile, Meowth, Pichu, Pikachu, Lugia, and many more. Plus, draw bonus poses of Pok mon in action and create your own battle scenes. You'll be a Pokemon drawing master in no time.
